metadata.dc:description: Clarice Starling visits the entomology office to seek assistance in identifying the type of moth discovered during an autopsy.

Carnegie Museum of Natural History is depicted as the entomology office where Jodie Foster (Actor) as Clarice Starling (Fictitious Character) seeks assistance in identifying the type of moth discovered during an autopsy. The Carnegie Museum of Natural History in the located at the Carnegie Institute, 4400 Forbes Avenue, Oakland.
metadata.dc:relation: Hannibal Lecter, Series 2 - The Silence of the Lambs
Hannibal Lecter, Series 2 - The Silence of the Lambs
metadata.dc:rights: The Carnegie Museum of Natural History is open to the public Monday - Sunday, various hours. The area where filming occured is restricted.
